string.value: If you're curious about the Arans, talk to #bCassandra#k.
She says you must collect Vague Aran Memories in order to obtain an Aran Memory Fragment.
You have collected an Aran Memory Fragment. Cassandra told you a story about a girl who's waiting for the heroes in Rien. What was her name...? Li...Lilin?
The Arans? You must be really curious about them. Doesn't the Curse of the Black Mage scare you at all?

The Arans. Hundreds and hundreds of years ago, five heroes led the people to a distant town in order to flee the Black Mage. Sadly, they failed at defeating the Black Mage and were encased in ice by a curse.

Everyone began to forget about the heroes, but there was one girl who never ceased to wait for them. What? You're curious about her? Alright then. Collect #b20#k #b#t04032366##ks that are scattered throughout the town. If you do, you'll find out more about the girl.
